extendedInfo.description: Simple Chess Clock does what it says. Built for touchscreen devices (1.6+), and designed for easy interaction. Features:* Configurable time* Time delays* Sound alerts* Easy to use interface* Open source! (GPLv3)Project: http://code.google.com/p/simplechessclock. Please report bugs (or requests) so I can fix 'em!

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Very ready to use... Wish it allowed you to give players more our less time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Exactly what the app name says. It has all the basic features needed with no distractions. Super easy to set up and use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best one...
reviews.comment: Small footprint, no obtrusive ads, works great, easy to set/use, nice big buttons, has 3 time modes to chose from....best chess  timer on android, and I\'ve even tried a few paid ones, THIS, it\'s a keeper. On my \"6 star\" list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best chess clock!
reviews.comment: I tried so many other chess clock\'s, but, believe me: this app, in my opinion, it\'s the BEST! Why? Because: - it\'s VERY SIMPLE and VERY EASY to use (just push the big buttons after you move a piece on a chess board or press the || button to pause the game); - it\'s VERY EASY to configure SETTINGS (also you can choose to play at the end of the game your own sound! Very nice this feature! For example, I made my own mp3 sound, with robot voice, and when the time is finished, it\'s start to \"scream\": \"Time\'s up! You lost!... Are you ready for a new game?\"...  :) ); - it\'s VERY NICE,  because both players can see their own watch in front of them ( not like others chess clocks witch one of the players must read his time upside down! ). Also you can\'t miss your time, because it\'s quite large (was nice if it was larger, but np) and when remain 1 min its change colour in green (when time\'s up, become red!:)); - it\'s VERY USEFUL, because don\'t let your let your screen to enter in power off and miss your time (like other chess clocks); - it\'s GREAT because has NO virus, advertising or other codes that can harm your android! Thank you developer for this GREAT application and keep it like this!
reviews.author: Testare Ted
